about_the_game:
◆Caution◆

This game is in Japanese.


◆Story◆

Akitsu Village, a mountain village deep in the mountains. ・・・・ The incident happened there.

Hey!　Gansho is there?　Is Ganjo there?

Everyone in the village came into the main shrine hall with a sound of footsteps.
Akinao Shihyo, the chief priest of the shrine, came face to face with this old man, the village chief, who was gasping for breath in front of him.
He told me that there was a "certain thing" on the trap.
He wanted to talk to me about how to deal with it.

I thought it would be a hassle, but I couldn't go against the village chief who has been taking care of me since Furu station, so I headed to the site.

Is it ...... on your head?"

Yes, that's right. Kensho, you have to do something about it.

Kenno was thus ordered to manage the captured demon.

"You... do you know the general formula of the impregnated demon?

"Impregnation ・・・・・・ demons ・・・・・・?"

Apparently, his grandfather, who was a priest of the previous generation, had studied it.

The next day, I was asked to help my grandfather to make the ceremony a success.
The next day, in order to ensure the success of the ceremony, he began researching the documents left behind by his grandfather.
Will he be able to complete the ceremony?



◆Character◆

Name: Izumi
Height: 163cm
Age: Secret
Three sizes：B105/W57/H9 6
Hobbies：Drinking, napping, making fun of Kenshyo
Pet peeve：Bad people


※Japanese voice recording
※Male characters are not recorded



◆Game Specifications◆

・Novel game that can be read by clicking.
・Heroine full voice
・CG mode
・CG mode ・Scene recollection


◆Content Warning◆

This game contains content not suitable for all ages and
may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

The game contains nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, sex without consent, and general adult content.
general adult content.

detailed_description:
◆Caution◆

This game is in Japanese.


◆Story◆

Akitsu Village, a mountain village deep in the mountains. ・・・・ The incident happened there.

Hey!　Gansho is there?　Is Ganjo there?

Everyone in the village came into the main shrine hall with a sound of footsteps.
Akinao Shihyo, the chief priest of the shrine, came face to face with this old man, the village chief, who was gasping for breath in front of him.
He told me that there was a "certain thing" on the trap.
He wanted to talk to me about how to deal with it.

I thought it would be a hassle, but I couldn't go against the village chief who has been taking care of me since Furu station, so I headed to the site.

Is it ...... on your head?"

Yes, that's right. Kensho, you have to do something about it.

Kenno was thus ordered to manage the captured demon.

"You... do you know the general formula of the impregnated demon?

"Impregnation ・・・・・・ demons ・・・・・・?"

Apparently, his grandfather, who was a priest of the previous generation, had studied it.

The next day, I was asked to help my grandfather to make the ceremony a success.
The next day, in order to ensure the success of the ceremony, he began researching the documents left behind by his grandfather.
Will he be able to complete the ceremony?

name: 孕み鬼 -鬼畜異形に蹂躙される巨乳鬼娘- Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

short_description: Izumi, the daughter of a demon, whom he caught by chance. You will train Izumi to obey you by making her attack various monsters. The game is a novel adventure game in which you train Izumi to obey you by making her attack various monsters.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
